title: Conversation UI not reconstructed from database
description:
When reloading a conversation from the database, the UI does not match the original:
- Tool calls are not displayed with proper formatting
- Attachments have no UI representation
- Images referenced in prompts that get converted are not shown
- The system message showing tool execution is displayed as raw text

This is a significant UX issue as users lose context when revisiting saved conversations.

Root cause: The database schema stores raw message content but not the UI component metadata needed to reconstruct the visual representation.

Potential solutions:
1. Extend database schema to store UI component metadata
2. Add message type field to distinguish tool calls, system messages, attachments
3. Create parsers to reconstruct UI components from stored message content
